channel.title: tor browser bug
channel.description:
I installed new version of firefox. but now, i cant use new firefox and tor at the same time. when i use firefox and i open a tor browser it opens a new tab and thats all.
firefox have his own profile. why tor cant open separately?
tell me please the command to open the tor broser separately.
the icon of new firefox has this command:
newmozilla/firefox/firefox

item.title: tor browser bug
item.dc:creator: HulaHoop
item.description:
kelane:

I installed new version of firefox. but now, i cant use new firefox and tor at the same time. when i use firefox and i open a tor browser it opens a new tab and thats all.

Confusing Tor and Tor Browser won’t help anyone trying to understand your bug report.

kelane:

tell me please the command to open the tor broser separately.

There is no command. Click the desktop icon.

Is this reproducible? Revert back to a snapshot before the upgrade (if you made one) and let us know if you still see it after running the upgrade again.

Suggestion. Reinstall Tor Browser by deleting the hidden .tb folder under /home/user. To see hidden folder press “Alt + .”

Read full topic
